original_text: (he did this only to teach warfare to the descendants of the Israelites who had not had previous battle experience):
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 세대 중에 아직 전쟁을 알지 못하는 자들에게 그것을 가르쳐 알게 하려 하사 남겨 두신 이방 민족들은

sentences.original_text: to the descendants of the Israelites
who had not had previous battle experience
